data.text:
MACON, Ga. (WGXA) -- UPDATE Wednesday, Aug. 30, 2023

The following school systems announced changes to start times or regular schedules on Thursday, August 31:

Laurens County- Classes resume as normal, but bus routes may change

Johnson County- Virtual Learning.

Twiggs County - All schools start one hour later and all bus pick-ups will run one hour later.

The following school systems will be closed on Thursday, August 31:

Montgomery County

Treutlen County

Original story:
